website_summaries.verdict: Easy-to-assemble ladder ball game set that includes quality PVC pipes.
pros: Bolas are made of golf balls, which ensure a long lifespan
All parts fit in a relatively small carrying case that you can take anywhere
Assembly is easy with the PVC pipes
cons: Golf ball bolas are a harder material than some other options

customer_reviews.title: This was our 2nd game We wore the first game ...
customer_reviews.text: This was our 2nd game We wore the first game out! This product was received with missing parts. Only 3 Bolas vs 6. and several of the ladder parts missing. No instructions included The game can not be played. I have not heard back from the manufacturer. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Chrys Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: The game is easy to learn and can be played by almst any ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it when we were preparing for a summer visit from our grandson. It is well made. The game is easy to learn and can be played by almst any age group--ok, maybe not extremely young children.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry P

customer_reviews.title: Great Bolas
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that they are real golf balls and not spill sand all over like the cheaper rubber-, sand-filled balls. However, the reason why I deducted a star is, that they do put dents into our metal cross bars. I believe another review mentioned the same thing. Not sure what they would do to cheaper plastic bars, but I could imagine that they would be capable of breaking them when thrown hard enough.
customer_reviews.author: IdahoJewel

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: One of the balls fell apart on the first use. I was playing in the yard with my sons. Trash! I would never purchase again. I have been trying to put it back together, but it's very difficult to get the rope back into the hole. My kids left part of our previous set out in the yard all winter and only one broke after all that time, this one on the first day!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Good Set
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of these at first but they are really durable. Have had for a year and haven't had a broken one yet.
customer_reviews.author: Colin W.

customer_reviews.title: Fun at the Beach
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun game to play at the beach. Easy setup and packs up in its own zippered case. Great customer service from the company as ours was missing a part and they sent it out UPS.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Z.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Large, durable and sturdy. It will be a long lasting family game. Kids will not be bored this summer when the days are long.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Had to return because they chipped. This was my ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because they chipped. This was my first time buying golf balls. I usually buy the sand Bolas. The sand only last one year. They sand leaks out. I was hoping golf balls would last longer. I guess I'll just have to buy new Bolas every spring.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Fun game.
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. Some of the parts fit together really tight and some are kinda loose. Doesn't really affect playing the game, but taking it apart the really tight pieces are really hard to pull apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Great replacements
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacements for the set my dog ate. Good quality and are standing up to lots of wear and tear so far.
customer_reviews.author: Demented Mama

customer_reviews.title: This product worked as advertised. We got these because ...
customer_reviews.text: This product worked as advertised. We got these because we built our own ladder ball set but didn't have the time to construct the balls. We played on hard and soft surfaces without issue. If for some reason I need to replace the balls again this will be my first choice.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Haber

customer_reviews.title: family game and friends game
customer_reviews.text: This is good game that the whole family can play together, it is quite stable, better to supervise and assist when young kids play.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Assembly of product.
customer_reviews.text: One of the balls, the string was not attached. I fed it through the hole and knotted it myself but it doesn't stay tight. I could have sent it back for them to replace but was ok with my quick fix. Other than that the product is nice.
customer_reviews.author: tanya bradtmuller

customer_reviews.title: Great game to play while camping
customer_reviews.text: Great game to play while camping. It's fun with friends and family. Kids loved it as well! Easy to assemble and sturdy, but do not push the pipes in too hard cause it can crack. It's made out of plastic. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of balls
customer_reviews.text: Needed a set of replacements after the dog found my original set. These are the real deal. Made of great material that I am sure will hold up to years of use... might actually survive a few hours of abuse from the dog as well!
customer_reviews.author: T-Rex

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The kit we bought had cheap plastic balls, so be sure to look for that when shopping. We bought these as an extra set for the 'adults' to use.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a replacement to a rubber set that shipped with our ladder toss game. These are much better to play with as they are real golf balls.
customer_reviews.author: Colton and Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our family BBQ
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our family BBQ. We even took it to the beach for a fun day in the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Ladder Ball Game
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful outdoor game in the backyard for the family. We can spend hours in this game. I feel it is a great alternative and encourage my children to stay away from their technology equipment for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it
customer_reviews.text: So much fun my kids love it perfect for the beach park or front yard
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dixon

customer_reviews.title: defective quality control
customer_reviews.text: The red connectors have a slightly larger diameter than the blue ones. When you put the toy together, the red side was a couple inches taller than the blue side. We tried to force the red connectors into the fittings but they would not tighten due to their larger diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia K

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this set. It’s heavy duty and replaced the cheap set we had.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Nice golf ball bolas
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Hard balls...Will crack a plastic ladder ball set..fyi
customer_reviews.author: J. Donofrio

customer_reviews.title: Decent set to play with
customer_reviews.text: Product is good. The length for me was not long enough for the bolos to wrap around the ladders. I had to restring the bolos to the length I desired.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Carter

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These are great balls but they dented the hell out of our metal ladder set. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis M

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement set
customer_reviews.text: The replacement bola balls are real golf balls and should be a great replacement to our backyard Blongo Ball set
customer_reviews.author: Vince  A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for our use. Could not find them any other place
customer_reviews.author: Fred Blitz

customer_reviews.title: Rope frays a little
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to ladder ball set! The golf balls are sturdy and like the rope. The rope frays pretty easily so if that is something that bothers you I wouldn't purchase this set!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Bowes

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up. Crowd pleaser for many ages. The base pops out easily, hence the 4 stars, but quickly can be reassembled.
customer_reviews.author: Rinski

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic
customer_reviews.text: So, it is ok...cheap, ill fitting pieces, but good enough...haven’t had it long enough to test its longevity, but probably a $10 value...the real kicker is the bolas are a squishy cheap version...NOT REAL GOLF BALLS AS ADVERTISED...they say to email prior to leaving a review, I did email and got no response...probably worth checking out other brands
customer_reviews.author: Will H

customer_reviews.title: Not true to description
customer_reviews.text: Even the slip of paper they include in the package says “Made from real golf balls” but they are rubber. Personally I don’t know if there are rubber gold balls and if there are rubber ones I certainly think that is pretty misleading!
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy the golf ball set ever
customer_reviews.text: Never buy again, this golf ball set dented my metal ladder ball set and you can’t play tail gating the balls bounce too high and hurts if they bounce and hit you Stay with the original soft set
customer_reviews.author: Dgc

customer_reviews.title: Just like originals. Very pleased with product and the service
customer_reviews.text: Replacement just in time for spring! Just like originals. Very pleased with product and the service.
customer_reviews.author: judy eyges

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. Balls are heavy and don’t knot up while playing. Very happy w my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Everyone enjoyed playing.
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy. It was played all day on the 4th of July by kids & adults. So far holding up & lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: dkm

customer_reviews.title: Bang up the ladders in your game
customer_reviews.text: These are well made but the golf balls beat up the ladders on our game because the are too heavy and hard for the ladders.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lightcap

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fun and a perfect gift for kids of all ages. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: M. Spain

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great! Easy to assemble and take apart. All parts are well made.
customer_reviews.author: S. arsenault

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not very well made, the balls kept popping off. I had to fix them myself......
customer_reviews.author: padre pio

customer_reviews.title: Golf ball bolas are the best.
customer_reviews.text: The real golf ball bolas add so much more to the game. Especially if you play on a hard surface.
customer_reviews.author: Phil M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, excellent fast delivery. Fun game.
customer_reviews.author: Mark  Wood

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These things are super durable, we played with them for about an hour on a concrete parking lot and they had minimal crashes or marks
customer_reviews.author: Shane Herbe

customer_reviews.title: They have done well and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a Christmas gift to go with a ladderball set! They have done well and great price!
customer_reviews.author: LLM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for and the price was right!
customer_reviews.author: Wilber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a high school graduation party and everyone loved it, three generations played and had a great time.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Pagliarulo

customer_reviews.title: No assembly directions
customer_reviews.text: This arrived without a color diagram on how to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Crapo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Game is awesome and arrived quickly. Employees played it at our company outing and was a huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: no score keeper on this version,otherwise would have been 5stars
customer_reviews.author: sloop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and take apart. Really fun outdoor family game!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Used on the beach this summer and they help up very way. The family loves play ladder ball.
customer_reviews.author: Bert C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Family has had a great time with this! Highly recommend. Good quality with nice heavy bolas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sports Festival Outdoor Ladder Ball Game Set with Carrying Case (6 Bolas), Bola Balls for Ladder Toss Game (6 Pack)
feature_bullets: 【PERFECT SET】 Includes 2 premium PVC targets with score trackers, 6 ladder golf balls (3 Red + 3 Blue), durable carrying case and rules.

【FASTEST ASSEMBLY & BREAKDOWN】 With telescopic and snap joint design, this multi-function ladder ball game set can set up well in 2 minutes. This ladder toss game set weighs less than 8 pounds and it takes up less than a cubic foot of space.

【UPGRADE BOTTOM​CONSTRUCTION】 This tournament style ladder golf game is made of durable 2. 5 mm virgin PVC tubing. The base are filled with sand for weighted stability, making this ladder toss ball game set is resistant to breaking.

【INDOOR/OUTDOOR GAME】 Tossing the ladder toss game balls is not only fun but also challenging when aiming for the top rung of the ladder. Fun for players of all ages and a hit at parties, BBQs, tailgates, holiday weekends, campsites and more!
【100% SATISFACTION】 We also offer you 100% risk-free satisfaction to let you buy Sports Festival with confidence. Contact us at anytime and we to give you an excellent after purchase experience.
